bibl.seg: TEETER Timothy M., Columbia Papyri XI. (American Studies in Papyrology. 38.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1998, 8°, xiv-97 pp. et 11 pll. ISBN 0-7885-0433-9. $34.95.
Diss. Columbia Univ., 1989. - P. Col. XI, 293-303: Literary/Liturgical Texts (293-296); - Documentary Texts (297-303).

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 147, pp. 183-185. - Céline Grassien-Yang, REG 112 (1999) pp. 280-282. - Amphilochios Papathomas, Tyche 14 (1999) pp. 370-372. - Ewa Wipszycka, JJurP 28 (1998) pp. 283-287. - Alia Hanafi, BACPS 16 (1999) pp. 27-28. - Matthew Kraus, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2000/2000-02-13.html >. - Paul Mirecki, BASP 38 (2001) pp. 135-145.
